mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Original scheme of legislature embraced three grades: 1, primary schools; 2, intermediete colleges; 3, university; first and last adopted; classical schools in U.S. generally defective; department of grammar, rhetoric and oratory not a separate one [at University of Virginia], but part of duties of two other professorships.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1824 May 1, Monticello, [Albemarle County, Virginia] to William Russell, New Haven, [Connecticut].
